carrot_farmer.location: Plains of Cyrene - Graveyard of Cyrene

item_6.name: The Shovel of Harvest
item_6.lore: The well-used shovel of a wretched carrot farmer.

item_7.name: Bloodstained Farmer's Hat
item_7.lore: The carrot farmer's cap. Instead of sweat, blood drips from your cheek.

item_8.name: Bloodstained Farmer's Shirt
item_8.lore: The carrot farmer's shirt. Large, worn, yet still fits.

item_9.name: Bloodstained Farmer's Jeans
item_9.lore: The carrot farmer's jeans. His blood forever will remain.

item_10.name: Bloodstained Farmer's Boots
item_10.lore: The carrot farmer's old bloody boots. It's still wet.

wheat_farmer.location: Plains of Cyrene - The Secluded Farmlands

item_11.name: The Scythe of Harvest
item_11.lore: The dull blade of a wheat farmer's scythe.

item_12.name: Tattered Farmer's Hat
item_12.lore: A wheat farmer's dirty, sun-stained cap.

item_13.name: Tattered Farmer's Shirt
item_13.lore: A crazed wheat farmer's stained shirt covered in sweat.

item_14.name: Tattered Farmer's Jeans
item_14.lore: A poor wheat farmer's worn out pants.

item_15.name: Tattered Farmer's Boots
item_15.lore: A wheat farmer's old boots that barely hold themselves together.

item_16.name: Shrinekeeper
item_16.lore: The magically infused axe of a naga shrine keeper.

item_17.name: Adra's Hood
item_17.lore: A light and weathered hood fit for a naga.

item_18.name: Adra's Weathered Breastplate
item_18.lore: A scaled platemail with a mysterious runic inscription.

item_19.name: Adra's Cloak
item_19.lore: A weathered cloak that appears to have water damage.

item_20.name: Adra's Holy Boots
item_20.lore: A weathered pair of boots with an unusual shape.

item_21.name: The Mad Pyromancer's Cracked Goggles
item_21.lore: Goggles crafted to withstand explosions and flames.

item_22.name: The Mad Pyromancer's Cloak
item_22.lore: A cloak singed in burning embers.

item_23.name: The Mad Pyromancer's Scorched Leggings
item_23.lore: Leggings scorched from a failed experiment.

item_24.name: The Mad Pyromancer's Boots
item_24.lore: Boots made for the endeavors of Stonehenge.

item_25.name: Wildfire
item_25.lore: A bow strung together with wicked magic and explosives.

item_26.name: Mayel's Poisoned Hatchet
item_26.lore: A well made, sharpened hatchet, suited for a thieving captain.

item_27.name: Mayel's Pristine Bandit Hood
item_27.lore: A fashionable helmet, kept in quite good shape.

item_28.name: Mayel's Battle Platemail
item_28.lore: Dented, battle-scarred, and yet highly protective platemail.

item_29.name: Mayel's Reinforced Leggings
item_29.lore: A pair of sturdy and well made leather leggings.

item_30.name: Mayel's Mountain Boots
item_30.lore: Boots made for long treks in the Dead Peaks.

item_32.name: Mitsuki's Leather Coif
item_32.lore: The ripped remains of a leather coif, far from an armorer's standards.

item_33.name: Mitsuki's Dirty Leather Rags
item_33.lore: Blood stained rags that reek of rotten flesh.

item_34.name: Mitsuki's Ripped Leather Pants
item_34.lore: These pants may as well be shorts due to their ripped nature.

item_35.name: Mitsuki's Leather Sandals
item_35.lore: Blood stained sandals, which appear to be uncomfortable.

item_36.name: The Mad Pyromancer's Cracked Goggles
item_36.lore: Goggles crafted to withstand explosions and flames.

item_37.name: The Mad Pyromancer's Cloak
item_37.lore: A cloak singed in burning embers.

item_38.name: The Mad Pyromancer's Scorched Leggings
item_38.lore: Leggings scorched from a failed experiment.

item_39.name: The Mad Pyromancer's Boots
item_39.lore: Boots made for the endeavors of Stonehenge.

item_40.name: Wildfire
item_40.lore: A bow strung together with wicked magic and explosives.

item_41.name: Mayel's Poisoned Hatchet
item_41.lore: A well made, sharpened hatchet, suited for a thieving captain.

item_42.name: Mayel's Pristine Bandit Hood
item_42.lore: A fashionable helmet, kept in quite good shape.

item_43.name: Mayel's Battle Platemail
item_43.lore: Dented, battle-scarred, and yet highly protective platemail.

item_44.name: Mayel's Reinforced Leggings
item_44.lore: A pair of sturdy and well made leather leggings.

item_45.name: Mayel's Mountain Boots
item_45.lore: Boots made for long treks in the Dead Peaks.

crimson_sorceress.location: Plains of Cyrene - The Crimson Monastery

item_46.name: Vindicta Requia
item_46.lore: The symbols engraved on this blade glow a deep red, fueled by its enemies' flesh.

item_47.name: Coif of the Demised
item_47.lore: A strange noble whisper can occasionally be heard emanating from this headwear.

item_48.name: Robes of the Deceased
item_48.lore: Even though they easily fit over the body, these robes feel slightly suffocating to wear.

item_49.name: Breeches of the Departed
item_49.lore: An eerie feeling lingers throughout the body while wearing these leggings.

item_50.name: Boots of the Dead
item_50.lore: These boots, although light to carry, seem as if they are sinking into the earth.

item_52.name: Redbeard's Captain Hat
item_52.lore: A worn-out hat, suited for a pirate captain.

item_53.name: Hefty Cloth Vest
item_53.lore: A vest made of very thick and sturdy cloth.

item_54.name: The Sash of Thieves
item_54.lore: A valuable leather belt with a golden hue.

item_55.name: Redbeard's Swift Chainmail Boots
item_55.lore: A small pair of boots to keep a pirate quick on his toes.

item_56.name: Gladia Sangura
item_56.lore: A scorched scythe etched with sapping runes.

item_57.name: Lady Rihker's Blistering Crown
item_57.lore: An intricate iron diadem whose metal is persistently red-hot.

item_58.name: Lady Rihker's Ritual Cloak
item_58.lore: A silken cloak whose fine trim is preserved with black magic.

item_59.name: Lady Rihker's Ritual Robes
item_59.lore: Thick enchanted robes scorched black and coated with ashes.

item_60.name: Lady Rihker's Blackened Treads
item_60.lore: Searing boots that melt the ground they touch.

item_61.name: Dying Breath
item_61.lore: The ancient crown of the Chapel.

item_62.name: Mistress' Hexed Breastplate
item_62.lore: The crimson hexed breastplate of The Mistress.

item_63.name: Mistress' Torn Skirt
item_63.lore: The torn skirt of The Mistress.

item_64.name: Mistress' Enchanted Boots
item_64.lore: The enchanted boots of eternal pain.

item_65.name: Eternal Agony
item_65.lore: The gnarled, accursed bow of Mistress Sibyl.

item_67.name: Merida's Overgrown Blouse
item_67.lore: The bushy yet fabled blouse of the wrathful.

item_70.name: Death's Whisper
item_70.lore: The accurate, deadly bow of Merida.

nest_queen.location: Dark Oak Forest - Spider Infested Woods

item_71.name: The Nest Queen's Fang
item_71.lore: The sharp fang of a powerful spider queen, tipped with poison.

item_72.name: Queen's Looted Headgear
item_72.lore: A rare helm found holding some spider eggs.

item_73.name: Queen's Looted Chainbody
item_73.lore: The prized chainmal of a foolish hero, stolen by the Nest Queen.

item_74.name: Queen's Looted Leggings
item_74.lore: The leggings of an ancient adventurer, gifted to the Nest Queen.

item_75.name: Queen's Looted Boots
item_75.lore: Long lost boots of an undead noble, scavenged by the Nest Queen.

shog.location: Al Sahra Savannah - Al Sahra Mining Camp

item_76.name: Overseer's Engraved Waraxe
item_76.lore: A waraxe faceted with marvelous gems mined by hundreds of lost souls.

item_77.name: Miner's Helmet
item_77.lore: A mesh helmet with a vibrant emerald, pulled from the depths of Al Sahra.

item_78.name: Overseer's Hauberk
item_78.lore: An interweaved shirt of iron rings.

item_80.name: Overseer's Sabatons
item_80.lore: Heavy boots, fit for the Overseer.

item_81.name: Cop'Jaks Deadly War Axe
item_81.lore: The axe made to unite Dark Oak.

item_82.name: Cop'Jak's Crude Crown
item_82.lore: Cop'Jak's attempt of a royal crown.

item_83.name: Cop'Jak's Heavy Chainmail Chestpiece
item_83.lore: A bad fit, made for the broad chests of trolls.

item_84.name: Cop'Jak's Chainlinked Leggings
item_84.lore: Large leggings that have been worn in many wars.

item_86.name: Helmchen Family Mace
item_86.lore: A timeless morningstar, forged by a legendary blacksmith.

item_87.name: Royal Helm of Helmchen
item_87.lore: A regal helmet passed down by The Lords of Helmchen.

item_88.name: Lord Taylor's Platemail
item_88.lore: A chestplate that cannot hide Lord Taylor's hunger.

item_89.name: Lord Taylor's Leggings
item_89.lore: Leggings fit for an everlasting lord.

item_90.name: Lord Taylor's Shattered Boots
item_90.lore: Boots in disrepair, but still fit for a lord.

item_91.name: Gladia Sangura
item_91.lore: A scorched scythe etched with sapping runes.

item_92.name: Lady Rihker's Blistering Crown
item_92.lore: An intricate iron diadem whose metal is persistently red-hot.

item_93.name: Lady Rihker's Ritual Cloak
item_93.lore: A silken cloak whose fine trim is preserved with black magic.

item_94.name: Lady Rihker's Ritual Robes
item_94.lore: Thick enchanted robes scorched black and coated with ashes.

item_95.name: Lady Rihker's Blackened Treads
item_95.lore: Searing boots that melt the ground they touch.

item_96.name: Dying Breath
item_96.lore: The ancient crown of the Chapel.

item_97.name: Mistress' Hexed Breastplate
item_97.lore: The crimson hexed breastplate of The Mistress.

item_98.name: Mistress' Torn Skirt
item_98.lore: The torn skirt of The Mistress.

item_99.name: Mistress' Enchanted Boots
item_99.lore: The enchanted boots of eternal pain.

item_100.name: Eternal Agony
item_100.lore: The gnarled, accursed bow of Mistress Sibyl.

item_101.name: Fearstriker
item_101.lore: Wielded by the great Ragnar. This mace has ended many that dared to question him.

item_102.name: Ironclad Headguard
item_102.lore: The durability of this headpiece is said to rival that of the great golems of Avalon.

item_103.name: Ironclad Breastplate
item_103.lore: Not even the mightiest of attacks have been capable of fully penetrating through this reinforced breastplate.

item_104.name: Ironclad Leggings
item_104.lore: Although worn throughout countless battles, not even a scratch can be seen on these fortified leggings.

item_105.name: Ironclad Walkers
item_105.lore: These boots offer a sturdy foundation to tread across the entire savannah.

item_106.name: Pyro Bandit's Molten Axe
item_106.lore: A molten axe which never seems to cool.

item_107.name: Pyro's Sturdy Helmet
item_107.lore: It still looks new, disregarding some dents on the side.

item_108.name: Pyro's Everlasting Tunic
item_108.lore: It's a miracle this tunic has survived this long.

item_109.name: Pyro's Loaded Leggings
item_109.lore: Each pocket has some sort of explosive remnant patched inside.

item_110.name: Pyro's Ash-Filled Boots
item_110.lore: Warm, explosive ash can be felt tucked in the toe caps.

item_111.name: Yakhel's One-Horned Helmet
item_111.lore: A horn is broken off due to a previous battle.

item_112.name: Yakhel's Beaten Breastplate
item_112.lore: The beaten plate of a fearsome raider.

item_113.name: Yakhel's Bloodied Leggings
item_113.lore: The bloodstained leggings of a fearsome raider.

item_114.name: Yahkel's Dusty Footwear
item_114.lore: Hundreds of skeletons have been laid to rest underneath these boots.

item_115.name: Yakhel's Haunted Bow
item_115.lore: The cries of the battlefield still ring within the bowstring.

item_116.name: The Thieving Mace of Greed
item_116.lore: A broad leeching mace once wielded by the King of Greed.

item_117.name: The Crown of Greed
item_117.lore: The encrusted crown of the Goblin King.

item_118.name: The Platemail of Greed
item_118.lore: Gold and emerald lines run through this strong platemail.

item_119.name: The Leggings of Greed
item_119.lore: The fine polished leggings of the Goblin King.

item_120.name: The Boots of Greed
item_120.lore: A pair of goblin boots with rich leather binding.

item_121.name: Burick's Cruel Axe
item_121.lore: An axe stained crimson red with the blood of fallen innocents.

item_123.name: Burick's Black Iron Chestplate
item_123.lore: A thick, hard and black piece of iron armour.

item_124.name: Burick's Black Platemail Leggings
item_124.lore: Made for long powerful legs which offer good protection.

item_125.name: Burick's Black Platemail Boots
item_125.lore: Spiked black boots clad in iron.

item_127.name: The High Priest's Dark Hood
item_127.lore: Crafted through the absorption of his enemies.

item_128.name: The High Priest's Gilded Robe
item_128.lore: Golden threads line The High Priest’s Robe.

item_129.name: The High Priest's Belt
item_129.lore: The enshrined belt of The High Priest.

item_130.name: The High Priest's Boots
item_130.lore: The nimble boots of The High Priest.

item_131.name: Mace of Malice
item_131.lore: Forged with malevolent energy, leaving victims in a state of despair.

item_132.name: Helm of Despair
item_132.lore: A glimspe of the suffering caused by the Warden.

item_133.name: Warden's Cruel Carapace
item_133.lore: Stained with the essense of brutality.

item_135.name: Warden's Stide
item_135.lore: Imbued with sinister energies of the Varenglade.

item_136.name: Zion's Sword of Banishment
item_136.lore: A powerful sword enhanced with the soul of the Skeleton King.

item_138.name: Zion's Soul-Fused Armor
item_138.lore: Armor possessed with the spirits of the Skeleton King's servants.

item_139.name: Zion's Spiritual Leggings
item_139.lore: Resistant to the most powerful of strikes.

item_140.name: Zion's Radiant Boots
item_140.lore: The shining boots of an undead king.

item_141.name: Lightsbane
item_141.lore: The cursed blade of a legendary warrior.

item_142.name: Full Helmet of the Damned
item_142.lore: The horned skull of an abyssal being.

item_143.name: Platemail of Wailing Souls
item_143.lore: The soul is all that remains of those sentenced to their doom.

item_144.name: Tattered Leggings of Suffering
item_144.lore: Disrepair shown through the endless ages of suffering.

item_145.name: Boots of the Underworld
item_145.lore: Covered in the gore of endless torture.

item_146.name: Redeye's Glacial Helm
item_146.lore: The frigid helmet of an exiled bandit.

item_147.name: Redeye's Plate of the North
item_147.lore: A frosty platemail with Priscilla's Crest.

item_148.name: Redeye's Leggings of Rejuvenation
item_148.lore: The warmth of these wooly pants keep the legs warm for running.

item_149.name: Redeye's Lucky Boots
item_149.lore: Four shiny coins are glued onto one boot, all facing heads.

item_150.name: Redeye's Frigid Longbow
item_150.lore: The chilled longbow of a secluded bandit.

item_151.name: Harvester of Life
item_151.lore: A mystical weapon, capable of sapping the life out of anything it touches.

item_152.name: Rustic Cowl
item_152.lore: When equipping this hat, a sense of calmness can be felt throughout the entire body.

item_153.name: Rustic Chestplate
item_153.lore: Even the deepest of injuries seem to disappear while wearing this chestplate.

item_154.name: Rustic Leggings
item_154.lore: Although stained with mud, these leggings feel soft and comforting to wear.

item_155.name: Rustic Treads
item_155.lore: These lightweight boots make traversing through treacherous terrain almost effortless.

item_156.name: Burick's Cruel Axe
item_156.lore: An axe stained crimson red with the blood of fallen innocents.

item_158.name: Burick's Black Iron Chestplate
item_158.lore: A thick, hard and black piece of iron armour.

item_159.name: Burick's Black Platemail Leggings
item_159.lore: Made for long powerful legs which offer good protection.

item_160.name: Burick's Black Platemail Boots
item_160.lore: Spiked black boots clad in iron.

item_162.name: The High Priest's Dark Hood
item_162.lore: Crafted through the absorption of his enemies.

item_163.name: The High Priest's Gilded Robe
item_163.lore: Golden threads line The High Priest’s Robe.

item_164.name: The High Priest's Belt
item_164.lore: The enshrined belt of The High Priest.

item_165.name: The High Priest's Boots
item_165.lore: The nimble boots of The High Priest.

item_166.name: Mace of Malice
item_166.lore: Forged with malevolent energy, leaving victims in a state of despair.

item_167.name: Helm of Despair
item_167.lore: A glimspe of the suffering caused by the Warden.

item_168.name: Warden's Cruel Carapace
item_168.lore: Stained with the essense of brutality.

item_170.name: Warden's Stide
item_170.lore: Imbued with sinister energies of the Varenglade.

cot.location: Dead Peaks - Frozen Atoll, Hallowburg Gate, The Last Watch

item_171.name: The Collector's Shiny Mace
item_171.lore: A jewel encrusted mace which glimmers in the sunlight.

item_172.name: The Collector's Glistening Braincase
item_172.lore: Rolling cogs make this braincase particularly uncomfortable.

item_173.name: The Collector's Magical Platebody
item_173.lore: Magical energies flow out of the large gem located in the middle of this platebody.

item_174.name: The Collector's Shimmering Garbs
item_174.lore: Rumors say that these pockets can expand to hold any amout of treasure.

item_176.name: Cleaver of Abaddon
item_176.lore: A flaming cleaver forged from the great hellfires of the underworld.

item_177.name: Hellfire Helmet
item_177.lore: Flames of hell protrude through this helmet, shaped like the horns of a Daemon Lord.

item_178.name: Hellfire Chestpiece
item_178.lore: A sigil of the Daemon Lord, a haunting reminder of dominance over all who dwell this earth.

item_179.name: Hellfire Greaves
item_179.lore: The embers of hell that emanate from these greaves distort the air around them.

item_180.name: Hellfire Stompers
item_180.lore: With every step taken, the ground trembles in fear of immense power.

item_181.name: Impa's Dreaded Longsword
item_181.lore: The legendary sword which led in the seige of Avalon.

item_182.name: Crooked Battle Mask
item_182.lore: The ominous black mask, worn by an impish general as a symbol of dark ages.

item_183.name: Haunting Platemail of Avalon's Fright
item_183.lore: A breastplate with the feared symbol of Impa's army carved into it.

item_184.name: Warding Skeletal Leggings
item_184.lore: Forged from the bones of fallen dwarves and imbued with the power of Avalon.

item_185.name: Skeletal Death Walkers
item_185.lore: The boots with which Impa stood among the throne of the underworld.

sylasia.location: Primeval Forest - Toadstool Vale and Siren Headwaters

item_186.name: The Earthweaver
item_186.lore: A fabled scythe which manipulates growth and decay.

item_187.name: Fairysilk Coif
item_187.lore: The coif of a nymph at one with nature, enchanted with a rare silk that cloaks the body comfortingly.

item_188.name: Fairysilk Robes
item_188.lore: Radiant robes that give off a faint fluorescent glow, enriched by the essence of life.

item_189.name: Fairysilk Leggings
item_189.lore: A fine pair of druidic leggings, made with material from a rare fungus.

item_190.name: Fairysilk Boots
item_190.lore: Silkshroom enchanted boots, which have an extrodinary connection to the natural world.

item_191.name: Zephyr's Arcane Scythe
item_191.lore: A prismatic silver scythe infused with the magic of a powerful mage.

item_192.name: Zephyr's Hood of Illusion
item_192.lore: Zephyr's relic, aiding in the work of dark magic.

item_193.name: Zephyr's Mythical Robe
item_193.lore: A mystical robe with the power to possess its host.

item_194.name: Zephyr's Silken Leggings
item_194.lore: Filthy breeches that have been exposed to many concoctions of magic.

item_195.name: Zephyr's Magical Boots
item_195.lore: Finely crafted boots which emanate a strange energy.

larith.location: Frozen North - The Iron Isles and Sleetstone Temple

item_196.name: Crown of Everlasting Prestige
item_196.lore: A magnificent crown, worn by great rulers of the past.

item_197.name: Breastplate of Absolute Greatness
item_197.lore: The glory of battle is forever lasting.

item_198.name: Legplates of Boundless Splendor
item_198.lore: Fame will befall on those capable of excellence.

item_199.name: Footguards of Neverending Triumph
item_199.lore: The footsteps of the victorious will last for an eternity.

item_200.name: Bow of Eternal Glory
item_200.lore: A powerful bow which radiates an energy reminiscent of the great peaks of the Frozen North.

item_201.name: Abyssal Accursed Scythe
item_201.lore: The great scythe of The Infernal Abyss.

item_202.name: Abyssal Accursed Helmet
item_202.lore: The burning helmet of The Infernal Abyss.

item_203.name: Abyssal Accursed Chestpiece
item_203.lore: The accursed chestpiece of The Infernal Abyss.

item_204.name: Abyssal Accursed Leggings
item_204.lore: The fiery leggings of The Infernal Abyss.

item_205.name: Abyssal Accursed Boots
item_205.lore: The studded boots of The Infernal Abyss.

item_206.name: Volcanic Ember
item_206.lore: Volcanic crown encrusted with jewels forged by volcanic ember.

item_207.name: Molten Anguish
item_207.lore: The molten chestpiece of a greater demon.

item_208.name: Blaze of Glory
item_208.lore: The fiery leggings of a greater demon.

item_209.name: Magma Treads
item_209.lore: Boots crafted by magma of The Infernal Abyss.

item_210.name: Flamehawk
item_210.lore: When an arrow is launched from this bow, you can hear a hawk's cry.

item_211.name: Moarri
item_211.lore: The mace aged through generations of a cruel war.

item_212.name: Frozen Crown
item_212.lore: The misty, royal crown of a greater demon.

item_213.name: Ice Lord's Unbreakable Chestpiece
item_213.lore: The unbreakable icy chestpiece of a greater demon.

item_214.name: Ice Lord's Frozen Leggings
item_214.lore: The frozen leggings of a greater demon.

item_215.name: Ice Lord's Boots
item_215.lore: The frost covered boots of a greater demon.

item_216.name: Rim'Dol's Decaying Blight Blade
item_216.lore: A Corroded Blade infused with both disease and famine.

item_217.name: Rim'Dol's Barbed Headdress
item_217.lore: An intricate ceremonial headdress embedded with a variety of carved bones.

item_218.name: Rim'Dol's Darksteel Robes
item_218.lore: Exquisitely decorated robes woven from a tough steel fiber and fine silk.

item_219.name: Rim'Dol's Sacramental Legguards
item_219.lore: An adorned pair of legguards emanating a feeling of sickness.

item_220.name: Rim'Dol's Ritualistic Boots
item_220.lore: A lightweight pair of ornate boots, dyed to a deep crimson.

item_221.name: Duranor's Mace of Torture
item_221.lore: Duranor's sledge of slavery, forged at the heart of Avalon.

item_222.name: Duranor's Robust Crown
item_222.lore: A shimmering crown that strikes great fear upon Avalon.

item_223.name: Duranor's Scorched Platemail
item_223.lore: The hardened chestpiece of a once reveled master of Avalon.

item_224.name: Duranor's Magma Infused Leggings
item_224.lore: The magma-scorched leggings of a merciless tyrant.

item_225.name: Duranor's Searing Boots
item_225.lore: Well-worn boots, scorched by traversing the treacherous depths of magma.

item_226.name: Blayshan's Wicked Axe
item_226.lore: An axe with the face of the cursed Blayshan carved into it.

item_227.name: Blayshan's Accursed Helmet
item_227.lore: A crown of thorns, which emits a strange deep purple.

item_228.name: Blayshan's Horned Platemail
item_228.lore: A light chestplate, studded with thorny horns.

item_229.name: Blayshan's Thorned Leggings
item_229.lore: Thorny leggings with graceful vitality from the great tree of dreadwood.

item_230.name: Blayshan's Scaled Platemail
item_230.lore: A pair of boots forged by the scales of nagas.

item_231.name: Mother of Doom's Poisonous Fang
item_231.lore: A fang ripped from the Mother's mouth, oozing with venom.

item_232.name: Mother of Doom's Head
item_232.lore: A trophy from the Mother of Doom, still dripping with venom.

item_233.name: Mother of Doom's Crystalhide Plate
item_233.lore: Crystal-encrusted exoskeleton once worn by the Mother.

item_234.name: Mother of Doom's Web Weave Leggings
item_234.lore: Those who wear these too long may find themselves succumbing to insidious influence.

item_235.name: Mother of Doom's Creepy Crawlers
item_235.lore: They give your feet an insatiably itching sensation.

item_236.name: Abyssal Accursed Scythe
item_236.lore: The great scythe of The Infernal Abyss.

item_237.name: Abyssal Accursed Helmet
item_237.lore: The burning helmet of The Infernal Abyss.

item_238.name: Abyssal Accursed Chestpiece
item_238.lore: The accursed chestpiece of The Infernal Abyss.

item_239.name: Abyssal Accursed Leggings
item_239.lore: The fiery leggings of The Infernal Abyss.

item_240.name: Abyssal Accursed Boots
item_240.lore: The studded boots of The Infernal Abyss.

item_241.name: Volcanic Ember
item_241.lore: Volcanic crown encrusted with jewels forged by volcanic ember.

item_242.name: Molten Anguish
item_242.lore: The molten chestpiece of a greater demon.

item_243.name: Blaze of Glory
item_243.lore: The fiery leggings of a greater demon.

item_244.name: Magma Treads
item_244.lore: Boots crafted by magma of The Infernal Abyss.

item_245.name: Flamehawk
item_245.lore: When an arrow is launched from this bow, you can hear a hawk's cry.

item_246.name: Moarri
item_246.lore: The mace aged through generations of a cruel war.

item_247.name: Frozen Crown
item_247.lore: The misty, royal crown of a greater demon.

item_248.name: Ice Lord's Unbreakable Chestpiece
item_248.lore: The unbreakable icy chestpiece of a greater demon.

item_249.name: Ice Lord's Frozen Leggings
item_249.lore: The frozen leggings of a greater demon.

item_250.name: Ice Lord's Boots
item_250.lore: The frost covered boots of a greater demon.

item_251.name: The Golden Glaive
item_251.lore: A brilliant golden glaive with an unbreakable crystal head.

item_252.name: Fluffy Wool Cap
item_252.lore: A warm cap from the northern library. Its durability is somewhat astounding.

item_253.name: Heavy Book Platemail
item_253.lore: Armor fashioned out of enchanted books. It's really heavy, but impervious to most damage.

item_254.name: Enchanted Paper Leggings
item_254.lore: Thin leather pants covered in elaborate runes to negate damage.

item_255.name: Hardcover Boots
item_255.lore: A pair of sheep skin boots enchanted to be harder than steel.

item_257.name: Cloak of Darkness
item_257.lore: Blend into the shadows of the night.

item_258.name: Lunar Legplates
item_258.lore: The full moon's light reflects off these shiny leggings.

item_259.name: Void Striders
item_259.lore: These boots seem to float over open space, if only for a moment.

item_260.name: Weaver of Shadows
item_260.lore: An ancient weapon rumored to devour the soul of any being pierced by its arrow.

storm_caller.location: Primeval Forest - Spire of Storms and Stone Forest

item_261.name: The Stormweaver
item_261.lore: By the power of this weapon, those who are worthy can bend the sky to their will.

item_262.name: Storm Caller's Helmet
item_262.lore: An orcish helm that channels the powers of the sky.

item_263.name: Storm Caller's Platemail
item_263.lore: An orcish platemail chestplate that has withstood many attacks from Renegade soldiers.

item_264.name: Storm Caller's Leggings
item_264.lore: Orcish leggings of incredible durability. They don't seem to have a single scratch on them.

item_265.name: Storm Caller's Boots
item_265.lore: Orcish boots that emit a thunderous boom with every step.

item_266.name: The Harvester
item_266.lore: A scythe covered in mushrooms from the harvest of years long past.

item_267.name: Empress' Pileus
item_267.lore: A shroom fit for the Empress' head, covered in fungi.

item_268.name: Fungi Robe
item_268.lore: A vibrant cloth robe, made of resilient and colorful shrooms.

item_269.name: Woven Pants
item_269.lore: A loose fitting garment made of moven mushrooms.

item_270.name: Fungi Sandals
item_270.lore: Small sandals that were a gift from a thoughtful guardian.

item_271.name: Heart of Rebellion
item_271.lore: A single, well-placed strike triumphs any foe.

item_272.name: Crown of Conquering
item_272.lore: No other troll gear has so little bloodstains.

item_273.name: Conqueror's Perfect Plate
item_273.lore: Shiny as the day it was made, polished and undented.

item_274.name: Conqueror's Efficient Leggings
item_274.lore: Flexible leggings for sidestepping spear throws.

item_275.name: Conqueror's War-stained Boots
item_275.lore: With agile steps, these boots are the only piece to be dirtied.

item_276.name: Cursed Filet Knife
item_276.lore: A razor sharp blade, cursed by the undead skeleton chef.

item_277.name: Chef's Legendary Toque Blanche
item_277.lore: A legendary toque blanche, ripped and well worn.

item_278.name: Chef's Double-Breasted Jacket
item_278.lore: A legendary chef's jacket, wrapped tight around the bones of the skeleton.

item_279.name: Chef's Houndstooth-Patterned Leggings
item_279.lore: A legendary pair of leggings, splattered with blood.

item_280.name: Chef's Reinforced Boots
item_280.lore: Legendary wyvern skin boots, solid at the toes.

item_281.name: Siegebreaker
item_281.lore: A heavy warmaul capable of obliterating defenders.

item_282.name: Krell's Peaked Helm
item_282.lore: Once the key to the throne, owned by one who cannot claim it alone.

item_283.name: Krell's Adorned Chestplate
item_283.lore: A heavy chestplate marked with medals and awards.

item_284.name: Krell's Legguards
item_284.lore: Thick, powerful leggings marred with dents and scratches.

item_285.name: Krell's Trench Boots
item_285.lore: Durable boots that have traveled across the land of Andalucia.

item_286.name: The Butcher's Cleaver
item_286.lore: The butcher's bloody cleaver that can cut human bone in a single chop.

item_287.name: The Butcher's Hood
item_287.lore: The blood-splattered hood of a butcher.

item_288.name: The Butcher's Platemail
item_288.lore: The dented chestpiece of a ruthless killer.

item_289.name: The Butcher's Apron
item_289.lore: The butcher's once white apron cannot be recognized anymore.

item_290.name: The Butcher's Boots
item_290.lore: Chunks of human meat are stuck to the soles.

item_291.name: Flamebind
item_291.lore: Radiant energy pulses off the head of the axe. The only safe part is the hilt.

item_292.name: Sunshade
item_292.lore: A sunhat that protects against heat.

item_293.name: Nadiri's Revenge
item_293.lore: Halas likes to bang his axe against it, so all challengers will hear him.

item_294.name: Scaled Legs
item_294.lore: The scales of these leggings reflect all manner of light.

item_295.name: Sandstone Boots
item_295.lore: The grit that covers these boots traces back to the Al Sahra Savannah.

item_296.name: Frostbind
item_296.lore: The chilling edge cuts through shadow just as well as flesh.

item_297.name: Frozen Sallet
item_297.lore: Brain Freeze doesn’t even begin to describe this helmet.

item_298.name: Frosted Chest
item_298.lore: The wind flurries across the spines of ice that coat this chestplate.

item_299.name: Glazed Leggings
item_299.lore: The solid ice can cause even the sharpest blades to slip on its surface.

item_300.name: Glacial Sliders
item_300.lore: Coated with ice, slipping with these boots results in more good than harm.

item_301.name: Omniscient Fury
item_301.lore: This brilliant blade flashes a spectrum of colors from its crystalline edge.

item_302.name: Crystal Crown
item_302.lore: In an empty world, the only thing it needed was one who could mold it.

item_303.name: Obelisk Cuirass
item_303.lore: Unbreakable crystal, formed of gemstones for thousands of years, fashioned into a chestplate.

item_304.name: Monolith Cuisse
item_304.lore: The void between the crystal is filled with energy.

item_305.name: Rift Walkers
item_305.lore: Energy flows into you from the void your toes. You feel like you're flying.

item_306.name: Crystalthorn Monocle
item_306.lore: The energy from the crystals flows directly into your skull.

item_307.name: Mirrored Hauberk
item_307.lore: Void energy pulses from the chestplate into your core.

item_308.name: Void Tassets
item_308.lore: Spiked crystals coat the exterior of these greaves.

item_309.name: Gravity Soles
item_309.lore: These boots feel both heavy and light at the same time.

item_310.name: Voidseeker
item_310.lore: A crystalline bow. The string hums with energy.

item_311.name: Kilatan's Reaver of Destruction
item_311.lore: Kiltan's most prized creation, imbued with the essence of the underworld.

item_312.name: Kilatan's Deathcrown
item_312.lore: A golden crown of tyranny and unrelenting power.

item_314.name: Kilatan's Legendary Platelegs
item_314.lore: Plates that protect the foundation of Gorgath's empire.

item_315.name: Kilatan's Legendary Boots
item_315.lore: Boots that carry the weight of the underworld.

item_316.name: Priscilla's Frozen Longsword
item_316.lore: A cold steel blade so sharp it can split snowflakes.

item_317.name: Priscilla's Crystal Tiara
item_317.lore: A sturdy and lightweight tiara created from fragments of frozen crystals.

item_318.name: Robe of the Frozen North
item_318.lore: A light cyan robe woven from the mystical snow of the north.

item_319.name: Frozen Silk Pants
item_319.lore: A pair of incredibly soft pants made to keep Priscilla agile in the northern frost.

item_320.name: Bear Skin Boots
item_320.lore: Boots made from the strong skin of polar bears in the north.

item_321.name: Flamebind
item_321.lore: Radiant energy pulses off the head of the axe. The only safe part is the hilt.

item_322.name: Sunshade
item_322.lore: A sunhat that protects against heat.

item_323.name: Nadiri's Revenge
item_323.lore: Halas likes to bang his axe against it, so all challengers will hear him.

item_324.name: Scaled Legs
item_324.lore: The scales of these leggings reflect all manner of light.

item_325.name: Sandstone Boots
item_325.lore: The grit that covers these boots traces back to the Al Sahra Savannah.

item_326.name: Frostbind
item_326.lore: The chilling edge cuts through shadow just as well as flesh.

item_327.name: Frozen Sallet
item_327.lore: Brain Freeze doesn’t even begin to describe this helmet.

item_328.name: Frosted Chest
item_328.lore: The wind flurries across the spines of ice that coat this chestplate.

item_329.name: Glazed Leggings
item_329.lore: The solid ice can cause even the sharpest blades to slip on its surface.

item_330.name: Glacial Sliders
item_330.lore: Coated with ice, slipping with these boots results in more good than harm.

item_331.name: Omniscient Fury
item_331.lore: This brilliant blade flashes a spectrum of colors from its crystalline edge.

item_332.name: Crystal Crown
item_332.lore: In an empty world, the only thing it needed was one who could mold it.

item_333.name: Obelisk Cuirass
item_333.lore: Unbreakable crystal, formed of gemstones for thousands of years, fashioned into a chestplate.

item_334.name: Monolith Cuisse
item_334.lore: The void between the crystal is filled with energy.

item_335.name: Rift Walkers
item_335.lore: Energy flows into you from the void your toes. You feel like you're flying.

item_336.name: Crystalthorn Monocle
item_336.lore: The energy from the crystals flows directly into your skull.

item_337.name: Mirrored Hauberk
item_337.lore: Void energy pulses from the chestplate into your core.

item_338.name: Void Tassets
item_338.lore: Spiked crystals coat the exterior of these greaves.

item_339.name: Gravity Soles
item_339.lore: These boots feel both heavy and light at the same time.

item_340.name: Voidseeker
item_340.lore: A crystalline bow. The string hums with energy.

xulgrath.location: Dead Peaks - Maltai Library, Maltai Throne, Maltai Outskirts

item_341.name: Xul'Grath's Axe of Banishment
item_341.lore: The axe of Gorgath's champion. It banishes foes to the underworld immediately after death.

item_342.name: Xul'Grath's Helm of Wisdom
item_342.lore: A legendary helmet that possesses vast knowledge of all of Andalucia's history.

item_343.name: Xul'Grath's Carapace of Souls
item_343.lore: Platemail forged and pervaded by the souls of the underworld. It seems virtually unbreakable.

item_344.name: Xul'Grath's Warded Leggings of the Underworld
item_344.lore: The tough leggings of Maltai's defender, infused with the might of Gorgath.

item_345.name: Xul'Grath's Unwavering Boots of Fortitude
item_345.lore: Boots that have walked throughout many realms.
